verses.verse: Now, <S%G1161><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> we [wish to] make <S%G1107><s%> known <S%G1107><s%> to you the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which has been given <S%G1325><s%> in the churches <S%G1577><s%> of Macedonia, <S%G3109><s%>

that in a great <S%G4183><s%> ordeal <S%G1382><s%> of affliction <S%G2347><s%> their abundance <S%G4050><s%> of joy <S%G5479><s%> and their deep <S%G899><s%> poverty <S%G4432><s%> overflowed <S%G4052><s%> in the wealth <S%G4149><s%> of their liberality. <S%G572><s%>

For I testify <S%G3140><s%> that according <S%G2596><s%> to their ability, <S%G1411><s%> and beyond <S%G3844><s%> their ability <S%G1411><s%> [they gave] of their own <S%G830><s%> accord, <S%G830><s%>
begging <S%G1189><s%> us with much <S%G4183><s%> entreaty <S%G3874><s%> for the favor <S%G5485><s%> of participation <S%G2842><s%> in the support <S%G1248><s%> of the saints, <S%G40><s%>

and [this,] not as we had expected, <S%G1679><s%> but they first <S%G4413><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> to the Lord <S%G2962><s%> and to us by the will <S%G2307><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Consequently <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> we urged <S%G3870><s%> Titus <S%G5103><s%> that as he had previously <S%G4278><s%> made <S%G4278><s%> a beginning, <S%G4278><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> he would also <S%G2532><s%> complete <S%G2005><s%> in you this <S%G3778><s%> gracious <S%G5485><s%> work <S%G5485><s%> as well. <S%G2532><s%>

But just <S%G5618><s%> as you abound <S%G4052><s%> in everything, <S%G3956><s%> in faith <S%G4102><s%> and utterance <S%G3056><s%> and knowledge <S%G1108><s%> and in all <S%G3956><s%> earnestness <S%G4710><s%> and in the love <S%G26><s%> we inspired <S%G1537><s%> in you, [see] that you abound <S%G4052><s%> in this <S%G3778><s%> gracious <S%G5485><s%> work <S%G5485><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

I am not speaking <S%G3004><s%> [this] as a command, <S%G2003><s%> but as proving <S%G1381><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the earnestness <S%G4710><s%> of others <S%G2087><s%> the sincerity <S%G1103><s%> of your love <S%G26><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

For you know <S%G1097><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> that though He was rich, <S%G4145><s%> yet for your sake <S%G1223><s%> He became <S%G4433><s%> poor, <S%G4434><s%> that you through His poverty <S%G4432><s%> might become <S%G4147><s%> rich. <S%G4147><s%>

And I give <S%G1325><s%> [my] opinion <S%G1106><s%> in this <S%G3778><s%> matter, for this <S%G3778><s%> is to your advantage, <S%G4851><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> were the first <S%G4278><s%> to begin <S%G4278><s%> a year <S%G4070><s%> ago <S%G4070><s%> not only <S%G3440><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> [this,] but also <S%G2532><s%> to desire <S%G2309><s%> [to do it.]

But now <S%G3570><s%> finish <S%G2005><s%> doing <S%G4160><s%> it also; <S%G2532><s%> that just <S%G2509><s%> as [there was] the readiness <S%G4288><s%> to desire <S%G2309><s%> it, so <S%G3779><s%> [there may be] also <S%G2532><s%> the completion <S%G2005><s%> of it by your ability. <S%G2192><s%>

For if <S%G1487><s%> the readiness <S%G4288><s%> is present, <S%G4295><s%> it is acceptable <S%G2144><s%> according <S%G2526><s%> to what [a man] has, <S%G2192><s%> not according <S%G2526><s%> to what he does not have. <S%G2192><s%>
For [this] is not for the ease <S%G425><s%> of others <S%G243><s%> [and] for your affliction, <S%G2347><s%> but by way <S%G1537><s%> of equality <S%G2471><s%> â€“

at this <S%G3588><s%> present <S%G3568><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> your abundance <S%G4051><s%> [being a supply] for their want, <S%G5303><s%> that their abundance <S%G4051><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> may become <S%G1096><s%> [a supply] for your want, <S%G5303><s%> that there may be equality; <S%G2471><s%>

as it is written, <S%G1125><s%> "He who [gathered] much <S%G4183><s%> did not have <S%G4121><s%> too <S%G4121><s%> much, <S%G4121><s%> and he who [gathered] little <S%G3641><s%> had <S%G1641><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> lack. <S%G1641><s%>"

But thanks <S%G5485><s%> be to God, <S%G2316><s%> who puts <S%G1325><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> earnestness <S%G4710><s%> on your behalf <S%G5228><s%> in the heart <S%G2588><s%> of Titus. <S%G5103><s%>

For he not only <S%G3303><s%> accepted <S%G1209><s%> our appeal, <S%G3874><s%> but being <S%G5225><s%> himself <S%G830><s%> very earnest, <S%G4705><s%> he has gone <S%G1831><s%> to you of his own <S%G830><s%> accord. <S%G830><s%>

And we have sent <S%G4842><s%> along <S%G4842><s%> with him the brother <S%G80><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> fame <S%G1868><s%> in [the things of] the gospel <S%G2098><s%> [has spread] through <S%G1223><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the churches; <S%G1577><s%>

and not only <S%G3440><s%> [this, <S%G3778><s%>] but he has also <S%G2532><s%> been appointed <S%G5500><s%> by the churches <S%G1577><s%> to travel <S%G4898><s%> with us in this gracious <S%G5485><s%> work, <S%G5485><s%> which is being administered <S%G1247><s%> by us for the glory <S%G1391><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Himself, <S%G846><s%> and [to show] our readiness, <S%G4288><s%>

taking <S%G4724><s%> precaution <S%G4724><s%> that no <S%G3361><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> should discredit <S%G3469><s%> us in our administration <S%G1247><s%> of this <S%G3778><s%> generous <S%G100><s%> gift; <S%G100><s%>

for we have <S%G4306><s%> regard <S%G4306><s%> for what is honorable, <S%G2570><s%> not only <S%G3440><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> but also <S%G2532><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of men. <S%G444><s%>

And we have sent <S%G4842><s%> with them our brother, <S%G80><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> we have often <S%G4178><s%> tested <S%G1381><s%> and found <S%G1510><s%> diligent <S%G4705><s%> in many <S%G4183><s%> things, <S%G4183><s%> but now <S%G3570><s%> even <S%G4183><s%> more <S%G4183><s%> diligent, <S%G4705><s%> because of [his] great <S%G4183><s%> confidence <S%G4006><s%> in you.

As for Titus, <S%G5103><s%> [he is] my partner <S%G2844><s%> and fellow <S%G4904><s%> worker <S%G4904><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> you; as for our brethren, <S%G80><s%> [they are] messengers <S%G652><s%> of the churches, <S%G1577><s%> a glory <S%G1391><s%> to Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> openly <S%G4383><s%> before <S%G1519><s%> <S%G4383><s%> the churches <S%G1577><s%> show <S%G1731><s%> them the proof <S%G1732><s%> of your love <S%G26><s%> and of our reason <S%G2746><s%> for boasting <S%G2746><s%> about <S%G5228><s%> you.
